meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'swing': moving back and forth or from side to side.
meanings.sent1: The swingingest of the playground was the tire swing.
meanings.sent2: The pendulum on the clock is the swingingest part.
meanings.sent3: The monkey bars had the swingingest action in the park.
meanings.sent4: The chandelier in the ballroom was the swingingest decoration.
meanings.sent5: The pirate ship ride at the fair was the swingingest attraction.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'swing': lively, exciting, or fashionable.
meanings.sent1: The swingingest party of the year had a live band.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was the swingingest outfit at the dance.
meanings.sent3: The swingingest dance moves were on display at the competition.
meanings.sent4: The swingingest trend in fashion this season is bold colors.
meanings.sent5: The swingingest event in town is the annual music festival.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of 'swing': characterized by a carefree or relaxed attitude.
meanings.sent1: The swingingest person at the beach was always smiling.
meanings.sent2: Their picnic in the park was the swingingest gathering.
meanings.sent3: The swingingest attitude at the office made everyone feel at ease.
meanings.sent4: The swingingest lifestyle is one filled with laughter and joy.
meanings.sent5: The swingingest vacation is one spent lounging by the pool.
